name: Peafowl Stance
summary: You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl.
description:
You enter a tall and proud stance while remaining mobile, with all the grace and composure of a peafowl. While in this stance, the only Strikes you can make are melee Strikes with the required sword. Once per round, after you hit with a monk sword Strike, you can Step as a free action as your next action.Peafowl Stance Leads To...

A stance lasts until you get knocked out, until its requirements (if any) are violated, until the encounter ends, or until you enter a new stance, whichever comes first.
